Package imagingbook.lib.math

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arithmetic  
    ChiSquaredDistance
    This code is volatile, don't use yet!
    Complex
    This class represents complex numbers.
    HomogeneousVector Deprecated. 
    MahalanobisDistance
    This class implements the Mahalanobis distance using the Apache commons math library.
    Matrix
    This class defines a set of static methods for calculations with vectors and matrices using native Java arrays without any enclosing objects structures.
    Statistics
    Utility class defines a few statistical methods.
